channel.title: Projects on Nhat Dao's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Nhat Dao's blog

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Apps in production

  • shippy.vn

    Built with Ruby on rails, React/Redux, Redis.

  • organicrein.com

    Built with Ruby on rails.

Side projects

  • XML Web Crawler

    A web crawler written in Ruby to scrape XML web pages.

  • UTA Scheduler

    A hybrid mobile application written in Ionic and Angular.js that lets students generate class schedules automatically, eliminating manual permutations of classes and daily activities and suggest changes if there is a conflict.

  • Weight Trend

    A MapReduce program in Java to calculate weight trend.

  • Programming Challenges

    My solutions to multiple coding challenge platforms in C++, Java, Python and Go.

  • Keep It Fresh

    A data mining project that predict restaurant’s health inspection scores based on Yelp’s academic datasets in Boston using topic modeling and feature engineer. A visualizer written in Ember.js is provided to show the results.`

Hackathons via my devpost profile

  • Healthy Hacker (TAMUHack 2015 top 4)

    Healthy hacker monitors your productivity at a hackathon by analyzing your keystrokes and mouse movements with K-mean clustering method. A dashboard , written in Electron and Angular.js, visualize your activities, send you a warning to take a break, suggest other activities to do in the hackathon.

  • Dispatch (HackDFW top 10)

    An automated emergency vehicle dispatching service includes a dashboard client written in React, an API written in Node.js with wit.ai ’s natural language processing API and an IOS client written in Swift.

  • ShouldAI (TAMUHack 2016)

    A random forest classifier helps you decide a better better investment between two transactions using your data from CapitalOne’s API.

  • Something Good (HackTX 2016)

    Scrape trending posts from similar news agencies in TX through Facebook API using Python, provides a visualizer written in Vue.js with Mapbox .

Projects at Mobi

  • UTA Now

    A hybrid mobile app using Ionic, Angular.js that connects students with events on campus.

  • UTA Parking

    An hybrid mobile app using Ionic, Angular.js that helps students find parking spots.

  • Roomies

    An IOS app written in Swift that help people find roommates.

  • Mobi’s member portal

    A portal written in React that contains materials for workshops done by Mobi.
